QuestData.Title: Excising the Taint
QuestData.Description: It looks like a group of the ambushers stayed behind. Make them pay for their insolence! Kill all of the Bloodfang stalkers at Olsen's Farthing. For Sylvanas! For the Horde!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: These dogs will soon learn the price of their arrogance!
QuestData.RewardText: <The Banshee Queen's voice invades your thoughts.>$B$BYou have avenged the fallen, $n, but there is more to be done.
